Author: greencoconutwater
Text: if i think about it rationally i'm aware that they aren't fat and that thighs jiggle. but i've been into kpop for a whole decade now while hearing those comments from my mom, i always catch myself judging and thinking mean things about 'healthy' and 'average' looking idols. i feel terrible about it, but my distorted views of female bodies are always being projected onto other girls and its awful

Author: lisbethhazarii
Text: KPOP idols are in no way “fat” nor “average”. Your mom has a distorted view of what “fat” is. Plus, all thighs jiggle when moving regardless of how much fat they have. She could possibly also hold celebrities to a higher regard as a lot of people do, but it’s still a pretty shitty thing to say.
